response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to both of us. This product, which I believe is worth $800,000 to you, is now being offered to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. This exceptional deal is designed to ensure that you not only secure a remarkable asset but also benefit from a significant saving. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of bringing this opportunity to fruition.", "product_price": 750000}
